articles.author: Tami Luhby
articles.title: Social Security whistleblower resigns ‘involuntarily’ - CNN
articles.description: Days after filing a whistleblower complaint claiming that the Department of Government Efficiency put Americans’ Social Security data at risk, the agency’s chief data officer “involuntarily” resigned.
articles.content:
Days after filing a whistleblower complaint claiming that the Department of Government Efficiency put Americans Social Security data at risk, the agencys chief data officer involuntarily resigned.
